document_data.name: Earth Anchor
document_data.mainbody: '''''Earth anchor''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Urogalan]].
document_data.Effects: This spell magically anchored creatures to the ground. It could be cast up to {{SI|10|yd|long=yes}} from the caster and affected an area with a {{SIAdj|30|ft|long=yes}} radius. Creatures in the area affect could not lift whatever appendage was in physical contact with the ground, only slowly shuffle along in a sliding motion. A creature leaving the area of effect could once again move normally. This spell only affected living and corporeal creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]]s the [[holy symbol]] of Urogalan and some mud.
